duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with all areas of tax - Federal, State, non-income tax compliance - tons of variety
Tax planning, cash flow planning, quarterly analysis and tax reporting throughout business
Very open-minded leadership that loves process improvements
M&A tax work as company expands investments // complex ad hoc projects
4 person Tax team // exceptional executive exposure and presentations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting/Finance, CPA required
